turkish_example_sentence: Onlar öğrencilere antik medeniyetin ilginç tarihini anlatsınlar.
english_example_sentence: Let them tell the students the interesting history of ancient civilization.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть они расскажут студентам интересную историю древней цивилизации.
